root.name: Purble Place
root.description: The 3 minigames included with Purble Place are: Comfy Cakes - This involves the user pressing the correct sequence of buttons to create the cake displayed by the game. Purble Shop - This involves the user selecting different facial features and trying to find the correct ones to recreate the animated character correctly. Purble Pairs - This requires the user to match up different tiles of the same type.
